CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Idaho Strategic Resources, Inc. Common Stock

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 201 N. THIRD STREET, COEUR D'ALENE, Idaho, 83814, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Idaho Strategic Resources Inc is a vertically integrated, operating junior mining company. It produces gold at the Golden Chest Mine. In addition to gold and gold production, the company maintains a strategic and domestic presence in the Critical Minerals sector and is focused on advancing its officially recognized Diamond Creek and Roberts Rare Earth Element projects in central Idaho.
